relation_gold_reason: This is a support relation. His claim is that "it's not fair", and he uses what's happening in those states as an example to support his claim.
sentence_1: When you look at North Carolina, when you look, and these governors are under siege, Pennsylvania, Michigan, and a couple of others, you got to open these states up.

relation_gold_reason: The relation is support. Pence claims that the "American economy is on the ballot", because Joe Biden "wants to go back to the economic surrender to China".
sentence_1: And Joe Biden wants to go back to the economic surrender to China, that when took office, half of our international trade deficit was with China alone.
sentence_2: And the American economy, the American comeback is on the ballot with four more years of growth and opportunity.
